text: Ate isa taram asim tuhade vala prakasana kiti hai. Apane hukama nala ika ruha-hula-kudusa (hazarata jibara'ila farisata) rahim. Tusim na janade si ki kitaba ki ciza hai. Ate na iha janade si ki imana ki ciza hai. Paratu asim isa cahude ham, nasihata prana karade ham. Besaka tusim ika sidhe raha te ho ate maraga darasana kara rahe ho
